MemoryInfobox.description: 'Having aided Diona, Kassandra thought to return to the priestess, fearing for her safety from the Cult of Kosmos|Cult.'

General_Description: '''In a Rush''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra returned to [[Diona]] after helping her to eliminate [[Cult of Kosmos]] presence on the island.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra helped [[Glaukos]] with his [[All Bonds Will Break|two]] [[Atoll Order|errands]] and returned to Diona. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I've freed your [[Mercenary|mercenaries]] and dealt with the captain as you desired.'' *'''Diona:''' ''That's good news. You've dealt a heavy blow to the [[Cult of Kosmos|Cult's]] forces.
You're getting sexier by the minute. Anything else?'' Kassandra retrieved the [[Pick Your Poison|bag of poisons]] from the [[Mycenaean Ruins]] south of Kythera Town and returned them to Diona. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Here's your apothecary's bag.'' *'''Diona:''' ''With this, we can make sure all our priestesses are armed for battle. Excellent work, ''misthios. Kassandra met with [[Eritha]] and fulfilled her [[The Handmaiden's Story|request]], then gave her regards to Diona. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your sister sends her regards.'' *'''Diona:''' ''Did you find out anything about this "''traitor''"?'' |-|There might be a traitor.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''There seems to be a traitor in the temple, but she's unsure who. There was just a note reading "Do not trust the [[Fates]]."'' *'''Diona:''' ''Interesting. It really is as my sister says, we can't trust anyone...
Thank you, ''misthios''. I'll watch my back. Is there something else?'' |-|Lie – We have proof of a traitor.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your sister has definite proof of a traitor.'' *'''Diona:''' ''W-what? That can't be! Who is it? You must tell me, or I won't know who to trust.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''We don't know yet. But your sister is looking into it.'' *'''Diona:''' ''I see. I too shall take my own precautions. A visit to see her might be in order. Thank you, ''misthios.
''Is there something else?'' With her tasks complete, Kassandra inquired about their next move. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I've done what you asked. What now?'' *'''Diona:''' ''My scouts will meet us at my [[Diona's villa|villa]]. They'll fill us in on what they've discovered, thanks to your efforts. I have something else to attend to, but...
If I get there, and we have some time on our hands, by the Fates, we'll have some fun.'' |-|I can't wait.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You'd better hurry. I'll see you at the villa.'' *'''Diona:''' ''I will.'' |-|We need to focus on the Cult.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''No. the Cult is what's important right now. I'll see you at the villa.'' *'''Diona:''' ''By the Fates, you can only resist me for so long...'' Diona took her leave and Kassandra proceeded to the villa.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra completed all of Diona's tasks and prepared to meet her at her villa to discuss their next move.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
